title: Bug 116744: Dynamic text content type has no effect
description: The dynamic text element's Content Type property does not have any effect on the displayed results.
OB: The report displays the same results regardless of the Content Type property set for the dynamic text element.
EB: When the Content Type property is set to 'Plain', I expect the literal content (including tags) to be displayed. When set to 'Auto', I expect the content without any HTML or RTF tags. And when set to 'HTML', I expect the HTML tags to be removed for content 1 and 2, and content 3 to be displayed with the RTF tags.
SR:
To reproduce the issue, follow these steps:
1. Prepare a database field with three types of content:
   a. HTML text within <html>...</html> tags.
   b. HTML fragments not within <html> tags.
   c. Text with RTF tags.
2. Use a dynamic text element to display the contents of this field.
